UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Panurgines, novel antimicrobial peptides from the venom of communal bee Panurgus calcaratus (Hymenoptera: Andrenidae).
Literature.Author: Cujová S, Slaninová J, Monincová L, Fucík V, Bednárová L, Stokrová J, Hovorka O, Voburka Z, Straka J, Cerovský V

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Micrococcus luteus CCM 144(MIC=0.8µM),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=1.5µM),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>100µM),Escherichia coli B(MIC=32.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>100µM),Candida albicans F7-39/IDE99(MIC=18.7µM)
